title: All Ball - Lakers Title Lock; Arrogance of 'Coach Kyrie'; College Insider Jon Rothstein Previews Reg. Season, Bubble Plan
itunes:title: All Ball - Lakers Title Lock; Arrogance of 'Coach Kyrie'; College Insider Jon Rothstein Previews Reg. Season, Bubble Plan
description:
In this episode, Doug looks at the inevitability of LeBron and the Lakers' Finals win, their path through the bubble, and Kyrie Irving's latest arrogant comments dismissing the importance of coaching, and why the KD/Kyrie marriage is doomed for failure. College hoops insider Jon Rothstein discusses the logistics of pulling off the proposed college basketball regular season regional bubbles, previews an uncertain 2020 season, and how he developed his extensive college contacts. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
